name: neuroline-nestjs
description: NestJS module and controllers for Neuroline pipeline APIs with DI.

scripts.build: tsup src/index.ts --format cjs,esm --dts --external @nestjs/common --external @nestjs/core --external neuroline --external neuroline/mongo --external mongoose
scripts.dev: tsup src/index.ts --format cjs,esm --dts --watch --external @nestjs/common --external @nestjs/core --external neuroline --external neuroline/mongo --external mongoose
